20101208213950.444|20101208213951.000|CCO|            save lives.

20101208213951.714|20101208213952.429|CCO|    Certain genetic factors

20101208213956.000|20101208213956.714|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk

20101208214004.571|20101208214005.286|CCO|  without talking to your doctor

20101208214006.000|20101208214006.714|CCO|    
20101208214006.714|20101208214007.429|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101208214007.429|20101208214008.143|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101208214008.143|20101208214008.857|CCO|
20101208214008.857|20101208214009.571|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101208214009.571|20101208214010.286|CCO|

20101208214011.000|20101208214011.526|CCO|    
20101208214011.526|20101208214012.053|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101208214012.053|20101208214012.579|CCO|
20101208214012.579|20101208214013.105|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101208214013.105|20101208214013.632|CCO|

20101208214017.316|20101208214017.842|CCO|        
20101208214017.842|20101208214018.368|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101208214018.368|20101208214018.895|CCO|    
20101208214018.895|20101208214019.421|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101208214019.421|20101208214019.947|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101208214019.947|20101208214020.474|CCO|    
20101208214020.474|20101208214021.000|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101208214021.000|20101208214021.833|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101208214021.833|20101208214022.667|CCO|    
20101208214022.667|20101208214023.500|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101208214023.500|20101208214024.333|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101208214024.333|20101208214025.167|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
